title: The Lion King
simple_desc: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: Hamilton
simple_desc: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.
stars: ['Lin-Manuel Miranda', 'Phillipa Soo', 'Leslie Odom Jr.', 'Renée Elise Goldsberry']

title: Singin' in the Rain
simple_desc: A silent film star falls for a chorus girl just as he and his delusionally jealous screen partner are trying to make the difficult transition to talking pictures in 1920s Hollywood.

title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
simple_desc: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

title: Swades
simple_desc: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

title: The Wizard of Oz
simple_desc: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz, and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others' wishes.
directors: ['Victor Fleming', 'George Cukor', 'Mervyn LeRoy', 'Norman Taurog', 'Richard Thorpe', 'King Vidor']

title: The Sound of Music
simple_desc: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
simple_desc: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

title: Sholay
simple_desc: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

title: Anand
simple_desc: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

title: La La Land
simple_desc: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: Aladdin
simple_desc: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: Beauty and the Beast
simple_desc: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

title: Fiddler on the Roof
simple_desc: In pre-revolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant with traditional values contends with marrying off three of his daughters with modern romantic ideals while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

title: The Blues Brothers
simple_desc: Jake Blues rejoins with his brother Elwood after being released from prison, but the duo has just days to reunite their old R&B band and save the Catholic home where the two were raised, outrunning the police as they tear through Chicago.

title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
simple_desc: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.

title: Dancer in the Dark
simple_desc: An Eastern European US immigrant with a love for musicals has to cope with the gradual loss of her vision.

title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
simple_desc: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.
stars: ['Preity G Zinta', 'Shah Rukh Khan', 'Saif Ali Khan', 'Jaya Bachchan']

simple_desc: A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
simple_desc: A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.

title: Mary Poppins
simple_desc: In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.

title: My Fair Lady
simple_desc: In 1910s London, snobbish phonetics professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make crude flower girl, Eliza Doolittle, presentable in high society.

title: All That Jazz
simple_desc: Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid career of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.

title: Cabaret
simple_desc: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

title: The Umbrellas of Cherbourg
simple_desc: A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.

title: Duck Soup
simple_desc: Rufus T. Firefly is named the dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of his wealthy backer Mrs. Teasdale, contending with two inept spies who can't seem to keep straight which side they're on.

title: Veer-Zaara
simple_desc: "Veer-Zaara" is a saga of love, separation, courage, and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.
stars: ['Shah Rukh Khan', 'Preity G Zinta', 'Rani Mukerji', 'Kirron Kher']

title: A Night at the Opera
simple_desc: A sly business manager and the wacky friends of two opera singers in Italy help them achieve success in America while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.

title: Tangled
simple_desc: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
simple_desc: When Stan Marsh and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

title: Fantasia
simple_desc: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music, ranging from the abstract to depictions of mythology and fantasy, and settings including the prehistoric, supernatural and sacred.
directors: ['James Algar', 'Samuel Armstrong', 'Ford Beebe Jr.', 'Norman Ferguson', 'David Hand', 'Jim Handley', 'T. Hee', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Hamilton Luske', 'Bill Roberts', 'Paul Satterfield', 'Ben Sharpsteen']

title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch
simple_desc: A gender-queer punk-rock singer from East Berlin tours the U.S. with her band as she tells her life story and follows the former lover/band-mate who stole her songs.

title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
simple_desc: The Muppets present their own touching rendition of Charles Dickens' classic tale.

title: The Little Mermaid
simple_desc: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.
stars: ['Jodi Benson', 'Samuel E. Wright', 'Rene Auberjonois', 'Christopher Daniel Barnes']

title: Moana
simple_desc: In Ancient Polynesia, when a terrible curse incurred by the Demigod Maui reaches Moana's island, she answers the Ocean's call to seek out the Demigod to set things right.

title: West Side Story
simple_desc: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

title: Guillermo del Toro's Pinocchio
simple_desc: A father's wish magically brings a wooden boy to life in Italy, giving him a chance to care for the child.

title: Mulan
simple_desc: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

title: Moulin Rouge!
simple_desc: A poor Bohemian poet in 1890s Paris falls for a beautiful courtesan and nightclub star coveted by a jealous duke.

title: The Jungle Book
simple_desc: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
simple_desc: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.
directors: ['William Cottrell', 'David Hand', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Larry Morey', 'Perce Pearce', 'Ben Sharpsteen']

title: The Muppet Movie
simple_desc: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

title: Baazigar
simple_desc: A young man with a vendetta against a business tycoon seduces the man's younger daughter, but she begins to suspect her new lover's connection with her elder sister and his ulterior motive.

title: The Greatest Showman
simple_desc: Celebrates the birth of show business and tells of a visionary who rose from nothing to create a spectacle that became a worldwide sensation.

title: Les Misérables
simple_desc: In 19th-century France, Jean Valjean, who for decades has been hunted by the ruthless policeman Javert after breaking parole, agrees to care for a factory worker's daughter. The decision changes their lives forever.

title: tick, tick... BOOM!
simple_desc: On the cusp of his 30th birthday, a promising young theater composer navigates love, friendship and the pressures of life as an artist in New York City.

title: Robin Hood
simple_desc: The story of the legendary British outlaw portrayed with the characters as anthropomorphic animals.

title: Pinocchio
simple_desc: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.
directors: ['Norman Ferguson', 'T. Hee', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Jack Kinney', 'Hamilton Luske', 'Bill Roberts', 'Ben Sharpsteen']

title: Hair
simple_desc: Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.

title: The Meaning of Life
simple_desc: The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

title: A Hard Day's Night
simple_desc: Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Sir Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live TV performance.

title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
simple_desc: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.

title: Devdas
simple_desc: After his wealthy family prohibits him from marrying the woman he is in love with, Devdas Mukherjee's life spirals further and further out of control as he takes up alcohol and a life of vice to numb the pain.
stars: ['Shah Rukh Khan', 'Aishwarya Rai Bachchan', 'Madhuri Dixit', 'Jackie Shroff']

title: White Christmas
simple_desc: A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.

title: Meet Me in St. Louis
simple_desc: Young love and childish fears highlight a year in the life of a turn-of-the-century family.

title: Kuch Kuch Hota Hai
simple_desc: During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.

title: Hum Aapke Hain Koun..!
simple_desc: Prem and Nisha meet and fall in love at the wedding of their elder siblings, but their plans to be together are put in jeopardy when Nisha's sister dies, leaving behind a baby.

title: Sing 2
simple_desc: Buster Moon and his friends must persuade reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of a new show.

title: Frozen
simple_desc: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
simple_desc: A newly-engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must seek shelter at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-n-Furter.

title: Oliver!
simple_desc: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor in 1830s London.

title: The King and I
simple_desc: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.

title: Yellow Submarine
simple_desc: The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.

title: Kabhi Khushi Kabhie Gham...
simple_desc: After marrying a poor woman, rich Rahul is disowned by his father and moves to London to build a new life. Years later, his now-grown younger brother Rohan embarks on a mission to bring Rahul back home and reunite the family.

title: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
simple_desc: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.

title: Hercules
simple_desc: The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.

title: Labyrinth
simple_desc: Sixteen-year-old Sarah is given thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother Toby when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King Jareth.

title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
simple_desc: The legendary tale of a barber who returns from wrongful imprisonment to 1840s London, bent on revenge for the rape and death of his wife, and resumes his trade while forming a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett.

title: In the Heights
simple_desc: A film version of the Broadway musical in which Usnavi, a sympathetic New York bodega owner, saves every penny every day as he imagines and sings about a better life.

title: Peter Pan
simple_desc: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

title: Across the Universe
simple_desc: The music of The Beatles and the Vietnam War form the backdrop for the romance between an upper-class American girl and a poor Liverpudlian artist.

title: Cinderella
simple_desc: When Cinderella's cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq and from her Fairy Godmother.

title: Corpse Bride
simple_desc: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

title: Lady and the Tramp
simple_desc: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

title: Alice in Wonderland
simple_desc: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

title: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
simple_desc: In 1850 Oregon, when a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.

title: Jesus Christ Superstar
simple_desc: Film version of the musical stage play, presenting the last few weeks of Christ's life told in an anachronistic manner.

title: Funny Girl
simple_desc: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

title: The Brave Little Toaster
simple_desc: A group of dated appliances embark on a journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in a cabin in the woods.

title: The Little Mermaid
simple_desc: A young mermaid makes a deal with a sea witch to trade her beautiful voice for human legs so she can discover the world above water and impress a prince.

title: Encanto
simple_desc: A Colombian teenage girl has to face the frustration of being the only member of her family without magical powers.

title: Grease
simple_desc: Good girl Sandy Olsson and greaser Danny Zuko fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?

title: West Side Story
simple_desc: An adaptation of the 1957 musical, West Side Story explores forbidden love and the rivalry between the Jets and the Sharks, two teenage street gangs of different ethnic backgrounds.

title: The Phantom of the Opera
simple_desc: A young soprano becomes the obsession of a disfigured and murderous musical genius who lives beneath the Paris Opéra House.

title: Chicago
simple_desc: Two death-row murderesses develop a fierce rivalry while competing for publicity, celebrity, and a sleazy lawyer's attention.

title: The Prince of Egypt
simple_desc: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

title: Sleeping Beauty
simple_desc: After being snubbed by the royal family, a malevolent fairy places a curse on a princess which only a prince can break, along with the help of three good fairies.

title: The Book of Life
simple_desc: Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.

title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
simple_desc: Kabir and Naina bond during a trekking trip. Before Naina can express herself, Kabir leaves India to pursue his career. They meet again years later, but he still cherishes his dreams more than bonds.

title: Christopher Robin
simple_desc: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.

title: Dumbo
simple_desc: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.
directors: ['Samuel Armstrong', 'Norman Ferguson', 'Wilfred Jackson', 'Jack Kinney', 'Bill Roberts', 'Ben Sharpsteen', 'John Elliotte']

title: An American in Paris
simple_desc: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

title: Beauty and the Beast
simple_desc: A selfish Prince is cursed to become a monster for the rest of his life, unless he learns to fall in love with a beautiful young woman he keeps prisoner.

title: Roald Dahl's Matilda the Musical
simple_desc: An adaptation of the Tony and Olivier award-winning musical. Matilda tells the story of an extraordinary girl who, armed with a sharp mind and a vivid imagination, dares to take a stand to change her story with miraculous results.

title: Sing
simple_desc: In a city of humanoid animals, a hustling theater impresario's attempt to save his theater with a singing competition becomes grander than he anticipates even as its finalists find that their lives will never be the same.

title: The Princess and the Frog
simple_desc: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

title: Enchanted
simple_desc: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil Queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

title: Anastasia
simple_desc: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

title: Little Shop of Horrors
simple_desc: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

title: The AristoCats
simple_desc: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

title: The Muppets
simple_desc: A Muppet fanatic with some help from his 2 human compatriots must regroup the Muppet gang to stop an avaricious oil mogul from taking down one of their precious life-longing treasures.

title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
simple_desc: Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.

title: The Sword in the Stone
simple_desc: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

title: Winnie the Pooh
simple_desc: While searching for honey, Pooh and his friends embark on an adventure to find Eeyore's missing tail and rescue Christopher Robin from an unknown monster called The Backson.

title: The Great Mouse Detective
simple_desc: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

title: Help!
simple_desc: Sir Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.

title: Fantasia 2000
simple_desc: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.
directors: ['James Algar', 'Gaëtan Brizzi', 'Paul Brizzi', 'Hendel Butoy', 'Francis Glebas', 'Eric Goldberg', 'Don Hahn', 'Pixote Hunt']

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
simple_desc: A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.

title: Hairspray
simple_desc: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
simple_desc: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.

title: Funny Face
simple_desc: An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.

title: 8 Women
simple_desc: One murdered man, eight women, each seeming to be eager than the others to know the truth. Gimme, gimme, gimme some clues to make up my mind. And eventually enter the truth. Oh, thou cruel woman!

title: Mohabbatein
simple_desc: A film about the battle between love and fear, between two stubborn men and their opposing beliefs and the outcome of the love stories of 3 couples.

title: Main Hoon Na
simple_desc: An army major goes undercover as a college student. His mission is both professional and personal: to protect his general's daughter from a radical militant, and to find his estranged half-brother.

title: Aashiqui 2
simple_desc: Rahul loses his fans and fame due to alcoholism. But he then decides to turn a small time singer into a rising star.

title: Dil To Pagal Hai
simple_desc: A grand musical about three passionate and dreamy characters: Rahul, Pooja and Nisha. Will their dreams come true? Will they find their true love?

title: Aladdin
simple_desc: A kind-hearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

title: Rio
simple_desc: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

title: A Goofy Movie
simple_desc: When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
simple_desc: A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.
stars: ['Dick Van Dyke', 'Sally Ann Howes', 'Lionel Jeffries', 'Benny Hill']

title: The Road to El Dorado
simple_desc: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.

title: Newsies
simple_desc: A musical based on the New York City newsboy strike of 1899. When young newspaper sellers are exploited beyond reason by their bosses they set out to enact change and are met by the ruthlessness of big business.

title: An American Tail
simple_desc: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

title: Muppet Treasure Island
simple_desc: The Muppets set sail in search of treasure, with Jim Hawkins and Long John Silver.

title: Charlotte's Web
simple_desc: Wilbur is a farm pig who's terrified that he'll end up on the dinner table. His friend Charlotte, a charming spider, comes to his rescue. She weaves words into her web, convincing the farmer that Wilbur is too special a pig to kill.

title: The Lion King
simple_desc: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: Frozen II
simple_desc: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.

title: History of the World: Part I
simple_desc: Mel Brooks brings his one-of-a-kind comic touch to the history of mankind covering events from the Old Testament to the French Revolution in a series of episodic comedy vignettes.

title: Meet the Robinsons
simple_desc: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

title: Tenacious D in the Pick of Destiny
simple_desc: To become the greatest band of all time, two slacker, wannabe-rockers set out on a quest to steal a legendary guitar pick that gives its holders incredible guitar skills, from a maximum security Rock and Roll museum.

title: Rent
simple_desc: This is the film version of the Pulitzer and Tony Award winning musical about Bohemians in the East Village of New York City struggling with life, love and AIDS, and the impacts they have on America.

title: Brother Bear
simple_desc: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
simple_desc: Kermit and his friends go to New York City to get their musical on Broadway only to find it's a more difficult task than they anticipated.

title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
simple_desc: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.

title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
simple_desc: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

title: Mary Poppins Returns
simple_desc: A few decades after her original visit, Mary Poppins, the magical nanny, returns to help the Banks siblings and Michael's children through a difficult time in their lives.

title: Pocahontas
simple_desc: An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.

title: Hairspray
simple_desc: Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

title: Popstar: Never Stop Never Stopping
simple_desc: When it becomes clear that his solo album is a failure, a former boy band member does everything in his power to maintain his celebrity status.

title: Vivo
simple_desc: Vivo, Sony Pictures Animation's first-ever musical adventure featuring all-new original songs from Lin-Manuel Miranda, will take audiences on an epic adventure to gorgeous and vibrant locations never before seen in animation.
stars: ['Lin-Manuel Miranda', 'Ynairaly Simo', 'Zoe Saldana', 'Juan de Marcos González']

title: All Dogs Go to Heaven
simple_desc: A canine angel, Charlie, sneaks back to earth from heaven but ends up befriending an orphan girl who can speak to animals. In the process, Charlie learns that friendship is the most heavenly gift of all.

title: James and the Giant Peach
simple_desc: An orphan who lives with his two cruel aunts befriends anthropomorphic bugs who live inside a giant peach, and they embark on a journey to New York City.

title: Teen Titans GO! To the Movies
simple_desc: A villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks five teenage superheroes who dream of Hollywood stardom.

title: Everyone Says I Love You
simple_desc: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a troubled marriage while her stepsister gets engaged.

title: Om Shanti Om
simple_desc: In the 1970s, Om, an aspiring actor, is murdered, but is immediately reincarnated into the present day. He attempts to discover the mystery of his demise and find Shanti, the love of his previous life.

title: A Prairie Home Companion
simple_desc: A look at what goes on backstage during the last broadcast of America's most celebrated radio show, where singing cowboys Dusty and Lefty, a country music siren, and a host of others hold court.

title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
simple_desc: Five years after the events of Mamma Mia! (2008), Sophie prepares for the grand reopening of the Hotel Bella Donna as she learns more about her mother's past.

title: Annie
simple_desc: A spunky young orphan is taken in by a rich eccentric, much to the chagrin of the cantankerous woman who runs the orphanage.

title: Tommy
simple_desc: A psychosomatically blind, deaf, and mute boy becomes a master pinball player and, subsequently, the figurehead of a cult.

title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
simple_desc: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: Lego Duplo invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

title: Spirited
simple_desc: A musical version of Charles Dickens's story of a miserly misanthrope who is taken on a magical journey.

title: Fame
simple_desc: A chronicle of the lives of several teenagers who attend a New York high school for students gifted in the performing arts.

title: Oliver & Company
simple_desc: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York City.

title: Smallfoot
simple_desc: High up on a mountain peak surrounded by clouds, a secret Yeti society lives in peace and harmony. One day, a Yeti witnesses an airplane crash; Inside lies "Smallfoot", a legendary creature that will rock the society to its core.

title: The Polar Express
simple_desc: On Christmas Eve, a young boy embarks on a magical adventure to the North Pole on the Polar Express, while learning about friendship, bravery, and the spirit of Christmas.

title: Dreamgirls
simple_desc: A trio of black female soul singers cross over to the pop charts in the early 1960s, facing their own personal struggles along the way.

title: New York, New York
simple_desc: An egotistical saxophonist and a young lounge singer meet on VJ Day and embark upon a strained and rocky romance, even as their careers begin a long, uphill climb.

title: Meet the Feebles
simple_desc: Multiple animals and insects experience the sleazier side of show business while working on a variety show.

title: Gigi
simple_desc: Weary of the conventions of Parisian society, a rich playboy and a youthful courtesan-in-training enjoy a platonic friendship which may not stay platonic for long.

title: Mamma Mia!
simple_desc: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular 1970s group ABBA.

title: Cry-Baby
simple_desc: In 1950s Baltimore, a bad boy with a heart of gold wins the love of a good girl, whose boyfriend sets out for revenge.

title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
simple_desc: The magical inhabitants of a rainforest fight to save their home, which is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.

title: Hoodwinked!
simple_desc: Little Red Riding Hood, the Wolf, the Woodsman and Granny all tell the police the events that led up to their encounter.

title: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
simple_desc: Fievel's family decides to move out to the West, unaware that they are falling into a trap perpetrated by a smooth-talking cat.

title: The Lorax
simple_desc: A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.

title: Trolls
simple_desc: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

title: Burlesque
simple_desc: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

title: Happy Feet
simple_desc: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!

title: The Grinch
simple_desc: A grumpy Grinch plots to ruin Christmas for the village of Whoville.

title: The Swan Princess
simple_desc: A power-hungry sorcerer curses a princess to live as a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.

title: Repo! The Genetic Opera
simple_desc: A worldwide epidemic encourages a biotech company to launch an organ-financing program similar in nature to a standard car loan. The repossession clause is a killer, however.

title: Muppets Most Wanted
simple_desc: While on a grand world tour, The Muppets find themselves wrapped into an European jewel-heist caper headed by a Kermit the Frog look-alike and his dastardly sidekick.

title: RamLeela
simple_desc: Modern adaptation of William Shakespeare's 'Romeo and Juliet' with an Indian twist, the film focuses on the story of Ram and Leela, their love, lust and the drama afterwards.

title: Rio 2
simple_desc: It's a jungle out there for Blu, Jewel, and their three kids after they're hurtled from Rio de Janeiro to the wilds of the Amazon. As Blu tries to fit in, he goes beak-to-beak with the vengeful Nigel and meets his father-in-law.

title: The Producers
simple_desc: After putting together another Broadway flop, down-on-his-luck producer Max Bialystock teams up with timid accountant Leo Bloom in a get-rich-quick scheme to put on the world's worst show.

title: Annette
simple_desc: A stand-up comedian and his opera singer wife have a two-year-old daughter with a surprising gift.

title: Pete's Dragon
simple_desc: An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to town with his abusive adoptive parents in pursuit.

title: Over the Moon
simple_desc: In this animated musical, a girl builds a rocket ship and blasts off, hoping to meet a mythical moon goddess.

title: Evita
simple_desc: The hit musical based on the life of Eva Perón (Evita Duarte), a B-picture Argentinian actress who eventually became the wife of Argentinian president Juan Domingo Perón, and the most beloved and hated woman in Argentina.

title: Lady and the Tramp
simple_desc: The romantic tale of a sheltered uptown Cocker Spaniel dog and a streetwise downtown Mutt.

title: Bride & Prejudice
simple_desc: A modern adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel, Pride and Prejudice, that features the lives of four unmarried daughters in an Indian family.

title: Trolls World Tour
simple_desc: When the Queen of the Hard Rock Trolls tries to take over all the Troll kingdoms, Queen Poppy and her friends try different ways to save all the Trolls.

title: Into the Woods
simple_desc: A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.

title: Rock of Ages
simple_desc: A small-town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

title: The Prom
simple_desc: A troupe of hilariously self-obsessed theater stars swarm into a small conservative Indiana town in support of a high-school girl who wants to take her girlfriend to the prom.

title: Gnomeo & Juliet
simple_desc: Separated by a garden fence and a feud, are blue gnomes on one side and red gnomes on the other. This doesn't stop blue Gnomeo and red Juliet from falling in love with each other. Do they have a future together?

title: Isn't It Romantic
simple_desc: A young woman disenchanted with love mysteriously finds herself trapped inside a romantic comedy.

title: The Rugrats Movie
simple_desc: The babies gets lost in the forest after Tommy Pickles gets a new baby brother.

title: Nine
simple_desc: Famous film director Guido Contini struggles to find harmony in his professional and personal lives, as he engages in dramatic relationships with his wife, his mistress, his muse, his agent, and his mother.

title: Happy Feet Two
simple_desc: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.

title: Raise Your Voice
simple_desc: A girl from a small town heads to the big city of Los Angeles to spend the summer at a performing arts high school.

title: Ae Dil Hai Mushkil
simple_desc: This story explores love - the shapes it takes, the ways it changes us and the exhilarating and often terrifying ride it takes us on. It is the journey of two characters, Alizeh and Ayan, as they navigate life, love and heartbreak.

title: Disenchanted
simple_desc: Fifteen years after her happily ever after, Giselle questions her happiness, inadvertently turning the lives of those in the real world and Andalasia upside down in the process.

title: I'm So Excited!
simple_desc: When it appears as though the end is in sight, the pilots, flight crew, and passengers of a plane heading to Mexico City look to forget the anguish of the moment and face the greatest danger, which we carry within ourselves.

title: Bang Bang
simple_desc: A young bank receptionist gets mixed up with Rajveer Nanda, a man who has a mysterious background.

title: Earth Girls Are Easy
simple_desc: A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.

title: Home on the Range
simple_desc: To save their farm, the resident animals go bounty hunting for a notorious outlaw.

title: Annie
simple_desc: A foster kid who lives with her mean foster mom sees her life change when business tycoon and New York City mayoral candidate Will Stacks makes a thinly-veiled campaign move and takes her in.

title: Popeye
simple_desc: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

title: Eight Crazy Nights
simple_desc: Davey Stone, an alcoholic with a criminal record, is sentenced to community service under the supervision of an elderly referee. Davey is then faced with trying to reform and abandon his bad habits.

title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
simple_desc: Three musical chipmunks are discovered by an aspiring songwriter who wants to use their amazing singing abilities to become famous.

title: Pinocchio
simple_desc: A puppet is brought to life by a fairy, who assigns him to lead a virtuous life in order to become a real boy.

title: High School Musical 3: Senior Year
simple_desc: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.

title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
simple_desc: The Chipmunks believe that Dave plans to propose to his new girlfriend in Miami.--and dump them. They have three days to get to him and save themselves not only from losing Dave but also from gaining a terrible stepbrother.

title: Blues Brothers 2000
simple_desc: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."

title: Grease 2
simple_desc: A British student at a 1960s American high school must prove himself to the leader of a girls' gang whose members can only date greasers.

title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
simple_desc: The world-famous singing preteen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

title: Peter Pan & Wendy
simple_desc: Follow the adventures of Peter Pan, a boy who does not want to grow up, and how he recruits three siblings in London, and together they embark on a magical adventure on the enchanted island of Neverland.

title: Cinderella
simple_desc: A modern movie musical with a bold take on the classic fairy tale. Our ambitious heroine has big dreams and with the help of her fab Godmother, she perseveres to make them come true.

title: Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
simple_desc: While recovering from an assassination attempt four days before his coronation, a stern prince is replaced by a romantic lookalike.
stars: ['Salman Khan', 'Sonam Kapoor', 'Abhinay Raj Singh', 'Neil Nitin Mukesh']

title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
simple_desc: Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up marooned in a tropical paradise. They discover their new turf is not as deserted as it seems.

title: Spy Kids 4: All the Time in the World
simple_desc: A retired spy is called back into action, and to bond with her new step-children, she invites them along for the adventure to stop the evil Timekeeper from taking over the world.

title: Kazaam
simple_desc: A troubled kid inadvertently releases a genie, who must grant him any three wishes he requests.

title: Cats
simple_desc: A tribe of cats called the Jellicles must decide yearly which one will ascend to the Heaviside Layer and come back to a new Jellicle life.

title: Gunday
simple_desc: The lives of Calcutta's most powerful Gunday, Bikram and Bala, changes when Nandita enters it. Then a counter-force takes charge and a thriller unfolds.

title: From Justin to Kelly
simple_desc: A waitress from Texas and a college student from Pennsylvania meet during spring break in Fort Lauderdale, Florida and come together through their shared love of singing.
